text: Anyone know if there’s a way to get a pipeline name and a deal stage name label in HUBL. I am trying to display deals in a CRM page but all I can get (as far as I can tell) is the ID for those which isn’t user friendly. Any help is appreciated!

I am having trouble with the `blog_recent_tag_posts`  function, it is not output anything in the array, I can get all the recent blog posts function to print and the blog tags to print all, I have confirmed tag is being used by the posts but that function still prints nothing out, the bottom function is the `blog_recent_tag_posts`
Video Player outputs the same JS files everytim eit loads on a page. I have it 12 times in a resource page and the payload is like 22Mb
BTW.. its worse than Wistia in this reguard. If it checked to see if the file was there already it wouldnt have this issue.
<@U38EZFVFE> sorry, I just wanted to check was this reply in response to my questions about `blog_recent_tag_posts`? it appeared right after my question which why I am asking
ah ok, I thought so thanks
